name: Captain Hero Bike Robot Rescue
description:
It’s time for ultimate survival in Captain Hero Bike Robot Rescue and rise to heights as flying robot Captain of America who transform into Robot Car and Robot Bike to rescue city in futuristic robot war. Help US Police win grand city battle for city rescue mission. Brand new bike robot transforming games brings Flying Captain USA hero of robot games who will exhibit super robot flying skills in amazing robot transformation games and flying rescue simulator. Gangster of crime city have created chaos and Miami police isn’t enough to fight them. For super city rescue mission flying robot super captain robot transformation into robot car and robot bike with futuristic robot battle will save super city and help US Police in city survival rescue games.

Captain Hero Bike Robot Rescue is the game of Flying Captain of America who transform into Moto Robot for City Rescue mission. An amazing blend of US police transforming robot games and US Transform shooting games is here to play in Captain Hero Bike Robot Rescue. Combat against gangster on call of US police and bring peace to super city. Fight and combat with real robot shooting power. Miami gangsters are not going to stop spreading evil so mega robot flying and survival rescue mission for flying robot hero super captain transform mission becomes more challenging in robot transformation games. This futuristic robot game Captain Hero Bike Robot Rescue will be carried out by flying robot super captain alone with intense combat mission of survival games against crime city gangster. Combat mission, critical strike & robot shooting is thrilling in real robot transforming game. Flying captain super hero captain transform bike robot to save super city from gangster squad and help US police. Futuristic robot war hero with super power of robot shooting game, robot transforming games who transforms into robot bike to fight against evil. The multi robot transformation of flying captain secret hero is ready to bring peace USA city and help USA police win transformation battle.

Features:
• Amazing Grand City Environment
• Superb Flying Robot City Rescue Game
• Great Robot Controls, Transformation and Animations
• High Quality 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
• Interesting Challenging Scenarios for Captain Hero
• Multi Robot Transformation in super hero games
• Amazing Flying Rescue Simulator
• Highly addictive real moto robot, moto car transform based play mode
